r.d: Classes to represent Tuples, general Vectors, and 2D-/3D-vectors, as well as a static class for vector operations.
r.n: Some other class name capitalization fixes. Using PEAR::raiseError() instead of creating a new PEAR_Error object Added new distance metrics between vectors: Manhattan (aka city) distance and Chessboard distance. Changed examples/vector_creation.php to show the use of the new distance metrics.
